site.name: SCAI
site.title: SCAI – Where vision becomes understanding.
site.description: SCAI – Where vision becomes understanding. An Electron desktop assistant that captures your screen, runs OCR locally with Tesseract.js, and pipes extracted text to Groq for instant insights and actions.

hero.headline: AI that reads your screen and explains it
hero.subtitle: A desktop assistant that captures your screen, runs OCR with Tesseract.js, and pipes extracted text to Groq for instant insights and actions.
hero.note: Global hotkeys: Ctrl/Cmd + Shift + X (capture) • Ctrl/Cmd + Shift + P (hide/show) • Persistent chat history • File uploads

features.heading: Built for Everyone
features.subtitle: Turn whatever is on your screen into something you can talk to: errors, logs, dashboards, docs, or any UI.

items.title: Global hotkey capture
items.description: Press Ctrl/Cmd + Shift + X from anywhere to capture your screen and run OCR instantly. Use Ctrl/Cmd + Shift + P to hide/show the window.

items.title: Interactive Q&A chat
items.description: Ask questions about your screen and get grounded answers using your capture as context. Quick action buttons for common queries.

items.title: Persistent chat history
items.description: All conversations are saved locally and persist across sessions. Search through chat names and message content instantly.

items.title: Organize your chats
items.description: Drag-to-reorder chats, rename by double-clicking, and toggle sidebar visibility for more screen space.

items.title: Context-aware diagnostics
items.description: Automatic error detection with root cause analysis, actionable recommendations, and fix snippets you can paste directly.

items.title: File uploads & previews
items.description: Upload files and see text/OCR previews before sending. Code copy buttons for one-click copying of code blocks.

items.title: Sensitive data redaction
items.description: Emails, API keys, JWTs, and private keys are automatically stripped before sending to AI.

items.title: Smart summarization
items.description: Long OCR text is summarized locally while preserving stack traces, errors, and code blocks.

items.title: Markdown rendering
items.description: Beautiful rendering of code blocks, headers, lists, and inline code with syntax highlighting and copy buttons.

steps.title: Capture your screen
steps.description: Press Ctrl/Cmd + Shift + X. SCAI captures your screen, renders it to a canvas, and passes it to Tesseract.js for OCR.

steps.title: Local OCR processing
steps.description: Text is extracted locally using Tesseract.js. OCR output appears instantly in the left panel with copy buttons.

steps.title: Ask questions & get insights
steps.description: Redacted text is sent to Groq. Get explanations, summaries, code fixes, and context-aware diagnostics in seconds.

steps.title: Manage your chats
steps.description: All conversations are saved locally. Search, reorder, rename, and organize your chats. Everything persists across sessions.

security.title: Local OCR
security.description: OCR runs on your machine. Only the cleaned-up text is sent to the AI API.

security.title: Redacted by default
security.description: SCAI automatically scrubs emails, tokens, and private keys before sending anything over the wire.

security.title: Local storage & privacy
security.description: All chat sessions are stored locally in your browser's storage. See exactly what's being sent to Groq so you stay in control of your data.
